TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Md_Abdul_Hamid, title = Md_Abdul_Hamid, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Md_Abdul_Hamid} }

S.FORM: I 1944 a miheca saka 1 folad saka 1 a romi'ad masofoc ci Md. Abdul Hamid , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Bangladesh anini i ci Md. Abdul Hamid, patirengan a romi'ad i 2013 a miheca saka 4 folad saka 24 a romi'ad.

I 1944 a miheca saka 1 folad saka 1 a romi'ad masofoc ci Md. Abdol Hamid , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Bangladesh anini i ci Md. Abdol Hamid, patirengan a romi'ad i 2013 a miheca saka 4 folad saka 24 a romi'ad.
